verbs.description: [ARG1: art and coffee] [V: go] [ARGM-PRD: together] [ARGM-LOC: in pottsville] it was an overcast day in pottsville as the october sun remained tucked behind the clouds but inside sage coffee house and tea garden on north centre street in pottsville vivacious colors are always on display regardless of the weather coffee art pottsville sage dawn liddick schuylkill county pennsylvania schuylkill county sage coffee house gary walters sarah siro michael siro pottsville pennsylvania dave naydock pa jenn raess
